translated: When I listened to the Dhamma
of the Teacher who was speaking,
I did not know any doubt
in the one who had conquered all.
In the leader, the great hero,🔽the best of charioteers,

original: Magge paṭipadāyaṁ vā,🔽kaṅkhā mayhaṁ na vijjatī”ti.
analyzed: magge paṭipadāyam vā  kaṅkhā mayham na vijjati iti
translated: about the path or the practice.
